modName: Categorized Favorites Menu for combat and alchemy
descriptionHtml:
I couldn\'t find a CFM that i like for my warrior play thru that did not have a lot of magic and stuff on it that I didnâ€™t want to use. So I play around with CFM and came up with this. I thought I would upload it because other people might like it.

==========================================================================================================================================================================
Supported
Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn

Supported Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286]Skyrim Redone v.0.99.23.1[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163]Frostfall v.2.2 [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors v.6[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644]Immersive weapons v.1.4[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950]Convenient Horses v4.5[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13931]Dovahkiin Relaxes Too v.1.5[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26228/]Realistic Needs and Diseases v.1.8.5[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter is Coming v.2.1b[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches  v.1.101[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23416]More Hotkeys (setup spell to illustion)[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]Ultimate Follower Overhaul  v.1.2i[/url]
==========================================================================================================================================================================
Installation NMM:
1. Install  [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
2. Install[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu [/url]
3. Install and activate my mod thru nexus mod manager and override when asked
=====================================================================================
If I missed anything or have something in the wrong category let me know so I can get it fixed.
Also if you know of any mods that would work well with this CFM please let me know so i can add it.
=====================================================================================
v1.1 update - added equipment menu per request. Also update a few foods not showing up.
v1.2 update - added more hotkeys please(just setup spell)
v1.3 update - added ufo follower commands and fix keyword on backpack
v1.4 update - added keywords for dragonborn and skyre 99.23.1
=====================================================================================

Credit to favmenumodder [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu [/url]
author: joshking
